name: Ergonomic Task Chair
description: Premium ergonomic task chair with adaptive support and intuitive adjustments for all-day comfort.
longDescription: Designed for the modern professional who demands both comfort and style. This task chair features advanced ergonomic adjustments, breathable mesh construction, and sophisticated aesthetics that complement any workspace.

name: Executive Leather Chair
description: Luxurious full-grain leather executive chair combining timeless elegance with modern ergonomic principles.
longDescription: The Executive Leather Chair represents the pinnacle of office seating. Hand-selected full-grain leather, polished aluminum accents, and advanced comfort features create an exceptional seating experience for the discerning professional.

name: Minimalist Desk Lamp
description: Sleek and adjustable LED desk lamp with wireless charging base and customizable lighting modes.
longDescription: This minimalist desk lamp combines form and function with its clean lines and advanced features. The integrated wireless charging pad and customizable lighting modes make it an essential addition to any modern workspace.

name: Leather Desk Mat
description: Premium full-grain leather desk mat that protects your workspace while adding sophisticated style.
longDescription: Crafted from carefully selected full-grain leather, this desk mat ages beautifully while protecting your desk surface. The perfect blend of function and elegance for your workspace.

name: Minimal Daily Pack
description: A thoughtfully designed everyday carry for the modern professional. Clean lines meet practical functionality.
longDescription: The Minimal Daily Pack represents the perfect balance between form and function. Crafted from premium water-resistant canvas with leather accents, this backpack features a dedicated laptop compartment, organizational pockets, and a timeless design that transitions seamlessly from commute to coffee shop to conference room.
features: Internal organization system with pen holders

name: Executive Briefpack
description: Where traditional briefcase elegance meets modern backpack functionality. For the discerning professional.
longDescription: The Executive Briefpack challenges conventional thinking about professional carry. This hybrid design combines the formal aesthetic of a traditional briefcase with the ergonomic benefits of a backpack. Premium full-grain leather construction ensures this piece will age beautifully while serving as your trusted work companion.

name: Adventure Daypack
description: Built for exploration. Whether urban or wilderness, this pack adapts to your journey.
longDescription: The Adventure Daypack is engineered for versatility. From city streets to mountain trails, its modular design and weather-resistant construction make it the perfect companion for any adventure. The external attachment points and expandable capacity ensure you're ready for whatever the day brings.

name: Tech Organizer Pack
description: Purpose-built for the digital nomad. Every cable, device, and accessory has its place.
longDescription: The Tech Organizer Pack is a digital professional's dream. With dedicated compartments for laptops, tablets, cables, chargers, and accessories, this pack ensures your tech arsenal stays organized and protected. The thoughtful internal layout and premium materials make it perfect for remote work and travel.
